author: barnabasbusa
content: shutting down devnet 3 first thing in the morning unless there are any objections.

author: nishant0
content: I think the initial objection was that it would add more work which would delay us from running a devnet with all clients. But given devnet-4 will be a big update( fulu + eip7742 ) and will possibly only be run at the end of november/first week of december it should be fine to have this and other bigger changes in.

author: dapplion
content: The root cause is this crazy reorg
